sentences.en: A British salvage company has located a Russian wreck.
sentences.cn: 一家英国的打捞公司找到了一条俄国的沉船.

sentences.en: All attempts to salvage the wrecked ship failed.
sentences.cn: 抢救失事船只的一切努力都失败了.

sentences.en: Chantal was lucky to be able to salvage her career.
sentences.cn: 尚塔尔能保住她的事业算是走了运。

sentences.en: Davis had to salvage his pride.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯必须得挽回他的自尊。

sentences.en: Divers hope to salvage some of the ship’s cargo.
sentences.cn: 潜水员希望能够抢救出船上部分货物。

sentences.en: It is not possible to try to salvage or change the polarity correctly by charging.
sentences.cn: 试图补救或通过充电的方法把极性改过来是不可能的.

sentences.en: Local administrations grouped in a joint salvage effort.
sentences.cn: 当地各管理部门联合起来协力挽救.

sentences.en: Meantime speedy salvage and relaunching of sunk or damaged landing craft would be imperative.
sentences.cn: 同时,迅速地打捞沉没或损坏的登陆艇,把它们重新送下水,也将是非办不可的.

sentences.en: Officials tried to salvage the situation.
Once the fire has died out, the salvage team will move in.
sentences.cn: 一旦大火熄灭，救援小组就会马上进入。

sentences.en: Perhaps we can still salvage my croquet set.
sentences.cn: 我们应该去找回那些槌球游戏的东西.

sentences.en: Quality control of color picture tubes may require the salvage and reuse of the glass envelopes.
sentences.cn: 彩色显像管的质量控制需要利用和回用玻璃泡废料.

sentences.en: the salvage of the wrecked tanker
The salvage was piled upon the pier.
sentences.cn: 抢救出的财产被堆放在码头上.

sentences.en: They climbed up on the rock with their salvage.
sentences.cn: 他们带着抢救出来的物品爬上岩石。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。
